body.p: This section is about a set of changes and additions to SIPp, contributed by Intel and aimed at providing an open source implementation of the IMS/NGN Performance Benchmark, ETSI specification TS 186 008.
To learn more about what it is and what it can do, please read the Introduction. To get a really quick feel for it, here are a couple of example benchmark reports for hypothetical systems:

li.a: Example Report with a hypothetical IMS Core as SUT
Example Report with a hypothetical SIP proxy as SUT

body.p: To learn how to use IMS Bench SIPp and how to create scenarios that take advantage of the features it brings, please refer to the Reference documentation.
